00036 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00037 
00038 class P3scan extends Model
00039 {
00040     public $Name= 'p3scan';
00041     public $User= '_p3scan';
00042     
00043     const CONFIG_DIR= '/etc/p3scan';
00044     const RE_LC_SUFFIX= '/p3scan-(.*)\.mail$/';
00045     
00046     public $NVPS= '=';
00047     public $ConfFile= '/etc/p3scan/p3scan.conf';
00048     public $LogFile= '/var/log/p3scan.log';
00049 
00050     public $VersionCmd= '/usr/local/sbin/p3scan -v';
00051 
00052     public $PidFile= '/var/run/p3scan/p3scan.pid';
00053     
00054     function P3scan()
00055     {
00056         global $TmpFile;
00057         
00058         parent::Model();
00059         
00060         $this->StartCmd= "/usr/local/sbin/p3scan -f /etc/p3scan/p3scan.conf > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00061     
00062         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00063             $this->Commands,
00064             array(
00065                 'GetCurrentLocale'  => array(
00066                     'argv'  => array(),
00067                     'desc'  => _('Get current locale'),
00068                     ),
00069                 
00070                 'GetLocales'    => array(
00071                     'argv'  => array(),
00072                     'desc'  => _('Get locales'),
00073                     ),
00074                 
00075                 'ChangeLocal'   => array(
00076                     'argv'  => array(NAME),
00077                     'desc'  => _('Change p3scan report language'),
00078                     ),
00079                 )
00080             );
00081     }
00082 
00083     function GetVersion()
00084     {
00085         return $this->RunShellCommand($this->VersionCmd.' | /usr/bin/head -2 | /usr/bin/tail -1');
00086     }
00087                     
00090     function GetCurrentLocale()
00091     {
00092         $localcf= self::CONFIG_DIR.'/p3scan.mail';
00093         
00094         if (is_link($localcf) && ($linkedfile= readlink($localcf))) {
00095             if (preg_match(self::RE_LC_SUFFIX, $linkedfile, $match)) {
00096                 return $match[1];
00097             }
00098         }
00099         return FALSE;
00100     }
00101     
00104     function GetLocales()
00105     {
00106         $files= $this->GetFiles(self::CONFIG_DIR.'/p3scan-*.mail');
00107         $files= explode("\n", $files);
00108 
00109         $locales= array();
00110         foreach ($files as $file) {
00111             if (!is_dir($file) && !preg_match('/.*\.(bak|orig)$/', $file)) {
00112                 if (preg_match(self::RE_LC_SUFFIX, $file, $match)) {
00113                     $locales[]= $match[1];
00114                 }
00115             }
00116         }
00117         return implode("\n", $locales);
00118     }
00119     
00124     function ChangeLocal($locale)
00125     {
00126         return $this->RunShellCommand('/bin/ln -sf '.self::CONFIG_DIR."/p3scan-$locale.mail ".self::CONFIG_DIR."/p3scan.mail");
00127     }
00128     
00129     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00130     {
00131         global $Re_Ip;
00132 
00133         if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00134             $re= "/USER '(.*)'$/";
00135             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00136                 $cols['User']= $match[1];
00137             }
00138             else {
00139                 $re_clientip= "($Re_Ip)";
00140                 $re_num= '(\d+)';
00141 
00142                 $re= "/Connection from $re_clientip:$re_num$/";
00143                 if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00144                     $cols['SrcIP']= $match[1];
00145                 }
00146                 else {
00147                     $re= "/Real-server address is $re_clientip:$re_num$/";
00148                     if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00149                         $cols['DstIP']= $match[1];
00150                     }
00151                     else {
00152                         $re_result= '(.*)';
00153 
00154                         $re= "/Session done \($re_result\). Mails: $re_num Bytes: $re_num$/";
00155                         if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00156                             $cols['Result']= $match[1];
00157                             $cols['Mails']= $match[2];
00158                             $cols['Bytes']= $match[3];
00159                         }
00160                         else {
00161                             // POP3 from 192.168.10.2:47845 to 10.0.0.10:110 from Soner Tari <soner@comixwall.org> to soner@comixwall.org user: soner virus: Eicar-Test-Signature file: /p3scan.8c0Ph
00162                             $re= "/POP3 from $Re_Ip:\d+ to $Re_Ip:\d+ from (.+) to (.+) user: .+ virus: (.+) file:.*$/";
00163                             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00164                                 $cols['From']= $match[1];
00165                                 $cols['To']= $match[2];
00166                                 $cols['Virus']= $match[3];
00167                             }
00168                         }
00169                     }
00170                 }
00171             }
00172             return TRUE;
00173         }
00174         return FALSE;
00175     }
00176 }

00178 $ModelConfig = array(
00179     'checkspam' => array(
00180         'type' => FALSE,
00181         ),
00182     'justdelete' => array(
00183         'type' => FALSE,
00184         ),
00185     'maxchilds' => array(
00186         'type' => UINT,
00187         ),
00188     'bytesfree' => array(
00189         'type' => UINT,

00191     'debug' => array(
00192         'type' => FALSE,
00193         ),
00194     'quiet' => array(
00195         'type' => FALSE,
00196         ),
